subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* A similar character, ⿱{{l|mul|[[⻀]][[𣏟]]}} can be found in the historical ''{{w|Jiyun}}'' dictionary. <!-- Refer http://dict.variants.moe.edu.tw/variants/rbt/word_attribute.rbt?educode=C11594#26 -->
** In mainland China, this form has been unified with ⿱{{l|mul|[[艹]][[林]]}} due to the ''{{w|Xin Zixing}}'' standardization of characters. ([[⻀]] → [[艹]], [[𣏟]] → [[林]])
